mapper.sql: ID, CER_ID, GET_ID, NAME, ZJLX, ZJHM, STATUS, MODE, CABINET_NUM, PLACE, COUNTER_NUM, OPERATOR, OPERATE_TIME
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_cer_exit_entry_repertory
ID,
CER_ID,
GET_ID,
NAME,
ZJLX,
ZJHM,
STATUS,
MODE,
CABINET_NUM,
PLACE,
COUNTER_NUM,
OPERATOR,
OPERATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{getId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{counterNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update oms_cer_exit_entry_repertory
CER_ID = #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GET_ID = #{getId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODE = #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CABINET_NUM = #{cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTER_NUM = #{counterNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oms_cer_exit_entry_repertory set CER_ID = #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GET_ID = #{getId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODE = #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABINET_NUM = #{cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLACE = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTER_NUM = #{counterNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, f.user_name get_people, b.get_time getTime, b.name, d.sex, d.post, b.zjlx, b.zjhm, e.yxqz, b.cer_Get_Ele_Sign cerGetEleSign FROM oms_cer_get_task b INNER JOIN oms_cer_get_task c ON b.cer_get_ele_sign = c.cer_get_ele_sign INNER JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo d ON b.oms_id = d.id INNER JOIN cf_certificate e ON b.cer_id = e.id INNER JOIN cf_user f ON f.user_id=b.get_People WHERE b.id = #{id} AND date_format(b.get_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(c.get_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
